titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PATHOLOGICAL RISK CLASSIFICATION CODE (AFTER NEPHRECTOMY) - Permitted Codes

stentry.p: Favourable: Non-anaplastic Wilms Tumour (all subtypes); cystic partially differentiated nephroblastoma; mesoblastic nephroma; diffuse nephroblastomatosis
Unfavourable: Anaplastic Wilms Tumour (focal and diffuse); malignant rhabdoid Tumour of kidney; clear cell sarcoma of the kidney; renal cell carcinoma
